ref_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
hyp_text: Additionally, the NSA revealed that Carter had secretly negotiated with the diplomatic corps of the country, including the Camp David Accords in 1978; he also improved relations with the US-China relations in the 1970s; the Iranian hostage crisis, which led to the international outcry and the subsequent release of the hostages, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Dipina tse pedi tsa setshwantsho, Bomamedi (The Fools Who Dream) le City of Stars, di fumane dithonyetso bakeng sa pina ya motheo e hlwahlwa ka ho fetisisa. Setudio sa Lionsgate se fumane dithonyetso tse 26 — ho feta setudio sefe kapa sefe se seng.
ref_text: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
hyp_text: The 26 songs of La La Land, including 'Audition (The Fools Who Dream)' and 'City of Stars', were nominated for Best Original Song at the 89th Academy Awards. Lionsgate, the studio behind the film, received 14 nominations in total — including Best Picture, Best Director, and Best Actor.

src_text: Sena se ha se bolele feela hore didaenosara tse ding di ne di na le masiba, e leng kutlwisiso e se ntse e pharaletse, empa e fanang ka dintlha tseo di-fossil ka kakaretso di ke keng tsa e netefatsa, jwalo ka mmala le tlhophiso ya didaemenshene tse tharo.
ref_text: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
hyp_text: It seems that these fossils are not even old enough to be considered ancient, as they are still relatively recent, but they are still being used to understand the past, and it's as if they are still whispering secrets to us, just like the stories of our ancestors that have been passed down through generations.

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.

src_text: Metsotso e mehlano kamora ho qaleha ha pontsho moya wa qala ho tsukutla, nako ya motsotso ha morao, moya wa fihlela lebelo la 70km/h... yaba pula ya qala, empa ka matla hona hoo e neng e otla letlalo la hao jwalo ka ho hlajwa ke nalete, kamora mona sefako sa theoha, batho ba ne ba tshohile mme ba tlatsitse lerata ebile ba matha ba hatana hodimo.
ref_text: Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other.
hyp_text: The wind was blowing at a speed of about 70km/h as we were approaching the point where the plane was going to take off, but the weather was not good, there was a storm, and the pilot had to make an emergency landing at a nearby airfield, because the runway was too short, and the passengers were shaken and frightened.

src_text: Huhne o itokolotse mme o tla nkelwa sebaka Khabineteng ke Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP o lebeletswe ho nka mosebetsi wa Letona la Kgwebo oo Davey a tswang ho wona.
ref_text: Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating.
hyp_text: It is reported that Ed Davey MP is to be appointed to the Cabinet, and Norman Lamb MP is to be replaced by the Chair of the Energy Committee, as Davey is stepping down from that role.
prompt:
<|begin_of_text|><|start_header_id|>system<|end_header_id|>

You are an accurate translator. You MUST answer with the following JSON scheme: {"translation": string}<|eot_id|><|start_header_id|>user<|end_header_id|>

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

Translate the following sentence from Southern Sotho to English:
[Southern Sotho]: Huhne o itokolotse mme o tla nkelwa sebaka Khabineteng ke Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP o lebeletswe ho nka mosebetsi wa Letona la Kgwebo oo Davey a tswang ho wona.
[English]:<|eot_id|>

<|start_header_id|>assistant<|end_header_id|>

{"translation": "It is reported that Ed Davey MP is to be appointed to the Cabinet, and Norman Lamb MP is to be replaced by the Chair of the Energy Committee, as Davey is stepping down from that role."}

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

hyp_text: The fertilizers in the organic matter, which is known as 'organic matter', contain proteins and help improve soil fertility.

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Bafuputsi ba tswang Princeton University naheng ya United States le Uppsala University mane Sweden ba tlalehile mofuta o motjha o qalehileng melokong e mmedi feela, leha tshebetso ena ho dumelwa hore e nka nako e telele haholo, ka lebaka la ho qhotsa dipakeng tsa Darwin finch e atileng haholo, Geospiza fortes, le o tswang kantle wa cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref_text: Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
hyp_text: The University of Princeton in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden have jointly published a study on the evolution of the Galapagos finch, specifically the large ground finch, Geospiza fortis, and the cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris, and it has been found that they have changed significantly over time, just like Darwin's finches, and it is expected that this will continue in the future, because the environment is changing, and the finches are adapting to it.

ref_text: Ocelots like to eat small animals. They will catch monkeys, snakes, rodents and birds if they can. Almost all of the animals that the ocelot hunts are far smaller than it is.

ref_text: In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations.
hyp_text: In 1624, the Dutch East India Company arrived in Taiwan, and they established a settlement, which was later fortified and expanded by the Dutch East India Company, with the aim of securing a foothold in the region and establishing trade with the indigenous people, the Machaena, and obtaining the permission of the local ruler.

ref_text: Up means you should start at the tip and push the bow, and down means you should start at the frog (which is where your hand is holding the bow) and pull the bow.

src_text: Mantswe ana ‘Technological determinism’ a bolelang hore thekenoloji e bohlokwa maphelong a rona e akaretsa letoto le pharaletseng la maikutlo a sebediswang, ho tloha tshututsong ya bothekenoloji kapa bohlokwa ba thekenoloji ho fihla kutlwisisong e tiileng ya hore phello ya batho e tla laolwa ke mehopolo ya thekenoloji ka melao ya saense le tsela eo e sebediswang ka yona thekenolojing.
ref_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
hyp_text: The concept of 'Technological determinism' suggests that technology is the driving force behind societal change, shaping human behavior and social structures, and that the pace of technological progress is the primary determinant of societal development, rather than social and cultural factors.

src_text: Tabeng ya Romanticism, dibaka di ile tsa susumetsa dikelello tsa batho, mme ha nako e ntse e feta ho ile ha hlahella meetlo le setso tse amanang le sebaka seo, mme tumellanong le sebaka seo setjhaba seo se leng ho sona, di ne di le molemo ho feta melao eo di qobellwang ho e amohela.
ref_text: In the context of Romanticism, the geography molded individuals, and over time customs and culture related to that geography arose, and these, being in harmony with the place of the society, were better than arbitrarily imposed laws.
hyp_text: The Romantic movement emphasized the importance of human emotions, and it was only later that it was realized that this emphasis on emotions was not compatible with the harsh realities of life, and thus it was necessary to balance the romantic ideals with the harsh realities of the world, and the nation's values, which were rooted in this world, were not in harmony with the ideals of this movement, and this was a source of conflict.

hyp_text: The old Medina has a good reputation for finding rare and exotic things from Morocco, such as spices, perfumes, incense, pipes, hookahs, and other unusual items, and it's a popular place for tourists.

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

hyp_text: It is said that the village will be moved to a new location next week, but it's uncertain whether they will be able to build a new school.

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}

src_text: Disutu ke tsela ya ho aparwa e thehilweng ya kgwebo, mme basebetsi-mmoho ba bitsana ka mabitso a bona a malapa kapa ka ditlotla tsa bona tsa mosebetsi.

[Southern Sotho]: Le ha ho le jwalo, batho bohle ba buang Sefora ba Belgium le Switzerland ba tla be ba ithutile Sefora sa motheo sekolong, kahoo ba ka kgona ho ho utlwisisa le haeba o sebedisa tsamaiso ya dinomoro ya Sefora.
[English]: {"translation": "Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system."}

[Southern Sotho]: Ho theosa le makgolo a dilemo, batho ba nnile ba haha ​​mathule ka hloko dibakeng tse matsutla-tsutla, tse moepa ho ya fihla mafikeng a maholo a shebileng lewatle.
[English]: {"translation": "Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dimmaele tse 800 tsa Trans-Alaska Pipeline System di kwetswe kamora ho tsholoha ha diketekete tsa dibarele tsa oli e tala ka borwa ho Fairbanks, Alaska.
[English]: {"translation": "800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska."}

[Southern Sotho]: Dikarolo tse ding tsa Belgium ya kajeno e ne e le karolo ya Luxembourg nakong e fetileng empa ebile tsa Belgium kamora Phetoho ya Belgium dilemong tsa bo1830.
[English]: {"translation": "Present-day parts of Belgium were part of Luxembourg in the past but became Belgian after the 1830s Belgian Revolution."}

[Southern Sotho]: Haesale ho tloha qalong ya yona, The Onion e bile ntlokgolo ya ditaba tsa nnete tse tlalehwang ka boswaswi, e nang le kgatiso ya dingolwa, webosaete e hohetseng baeti ba kgetholohileng ba 5,000,000 kgweding ya Mphalane, dipapatso tsa botho, netweke ya ditaba ya dihoreng tse 24, di-podcast, le moraorao ho thakgolwa ha atlelase ya lefatshe e bitswang Our Dumb World.
[English]: {"translation": "Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World."}
